responses.title: My quiver and bow are ready!
I'm notched, I'm taut, I'm ready to fly.
First blood, and a point well taken.
I have waited for this moment...
I seal you all in silence!
The secrets of the wood are mine!
Hm hm hm hm hm ha ha ha ha ha ha hm hm hm hm hm hm!
Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm!
A foundlings life is all a gift.
Blown out on a cold wind.
I'll cut a notch with your name on it!
I thought they warned you not to speak with rangers.
The lanes are lined with the likes of you.
Many a grave is hidden in these woods.
The Drow have one less enemy now.
Let me get my arrows back, and then you can die.
You were too noisy to live.
There are some things you weren't meant to see. Such as tomorrow.
We hardly knew you. Just as well.
I know I should respect the dead, but first you have to earn it.
Now that you're dead, I find it easy to respect you.
Don't quit your day job, Luna.
Oh good, some genuine cat gut.
My arrow found your arrow's mark.
I heard your bones rattle with fear.
Clinkz, were you named after chattering teeth?
You met your match today, Clinkz.
The olden ways are best, Sniper.
You're not out of the woods yet, Enchantress.
I was hiding in your shadow the whole time.
The woods have spoken, and they chose me.
Let's put it to a vote.
Cold made you hard, but ice made you brittle.
There's more than one hunter in these woods.
No bear can stand to my bow.
Prophet, you and I will reclaim these woods.
Enchantress, will you be prancing our enemy to death?
I'm back before the arrow fired has fallen!
The mist that chills you keeps me warm.
I walk alone, but the shadows are company enough.
The only sin is an ungodly racket.
Follow me into the forest shade, and none may spy on us.
I've been saving for so long…
Sometimes you just have to splurge…
You'll have to do better than that!
Put it out of your mind.
This couldn't have ended any other way.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Huh huh huh huh ha huh.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
I'll need a hand free for this.
The arrow stabs from afar. Blink Dagger brings me closer.

name: Attempting to Use an Ability on Cooldown
Attempting to Use an Ability without Mana

responses.title: May the Drow keep you safe.
A treasure true as an arrow's flight!
